data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PDL::LAPACK is an extension to PDL that allows to access functions
    from LAPACK. PDL offers matrix and vectors as perl objects. But
    there are fast linear algebra functions missing. With PDL::LAPACK
    you can use the fast fortran/C-functions from LAPACK/CLAPACK. The
    LAPACK driver function are long time proved, mighty, fast though
    easy to use.
